summary: Ports of the swords of King Henselt and Prince Stennis from The Witcher 2.
descriptionHtml:
The swords of King Henselt of Kaedwen and Prince Stennis of Aedirn from The Witcher 2. Pretty much a straight port.

VISUAL FEATURES:
- The diffuse texture had its shading enhanced a little bit. Mask and normal map untouched apart from being altered to match Skyrim\'s shading system.
- Blood effects and scabbards.

GAMEPLAY FEATURES:
- 4 new craftable, temperable swords. Each sword comes in 1H and 2H version.
- Stats roughly equivalent to ebony, with slightly higher speed and longer reach.
- Require Ebony smithing to craft. Type \"help stennis\" and \"help henselt\" (no quotes) into the console to get the IDs for the player.additem command if you don\\\'t want to go through this.

OPTIONAL FILES:
- Make the scabbards use the textures from \"Witcher 2 swords HD\" ( http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13552/ ) by Suhoi72 if you have it installed. That mod is highly recommended as the textures look a lot better, though they are performance intensive. I recommend resaving them with DXT compression (1 for diffuse/mask, 5 or 3 for normal map).
author: MRRT
